name: Picidae, the BirdBoy Runner
description:
My first Game!

hi everybody !

It's a mix between alto's adventure and flappy bird, I hope you enjoy it

BE CAREFUL! plants and bees EXPLODE!

when you jump you get more and more tired, until you touch the ground

If you are powered by boots, you double your speed, you don't get tired of jumping, and you are untouchable for 3 seconds

Controls:  WASD or  arrows to move and Spacebar to jump

PLAY IT ON FULLSCREEN!

POST your HighScore !
